item.description:
I attended last week and LOVED the class format....

1.  For those of us that usually feel self conscious in exercise classes (and/or who aren't always really in-step/graceful/etc....) I loved the fact that she turns the lights down way low and plugs in the colored disco balls.  If I wasn't doing the moves exactly what she was no one could really tell!  I was moving/exercising so I didn't care if it wasn't perfect.

2.  The first part of the class is just a "dancing at a club" type of warmup.  She plays current music. She does some moves and we copy them and dance together. 

3.  THEN you learn a mini routine/dance sequence.  We laughed, we messed up, we modifed things, and we ended up with a cute little number in time to a funky song.

All of the fitness classes are "drop-in" so you don't have to commit to anything - just $10 per class! Also, you can purchase multi-class deals: 10 classes for $90 or 20 classes for $160. The cards are good for one year from purchase date.

Check out the full schedule at: http://www.melrosedan... Classes are held in the basement studio of the United Methodist Church at 645 Main St., Melrose.  Park along Main St. and walk back to the side entrance of the church (there is a sign).
item.how_to_find_us: Walk along the side of the church (between church and huge apt. bldg) to the back and enter side doors (there will be a side)
item.why: She turns down the lights and turns on the colored disco balls so it's a fun, funky setting that eliminates being self conscious! This is a FUN, affordable, great way to exercise - classes are $8-$10 depending on how often you go.
item.name: Attend a fun dance class in Melrose (on Main St.) for $10!
